localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Liquity is a decentralized borrowing protocol that offers interest-free liquidity against ETH as collateral. Loans are issued in LUSD — a USD pegged stablecoin, and need to maintain a minimum collateral ratio of only 110% due to a novel liquidation mechanism.
nodes.title: Liquity Protocol - Interest-free liquidity at your fingertips
nodes.author: Cédric Waldburger

localize.description: Liquityは、ETHを担保に無利息の流動性を提供する分散型の借り入れプロトコルです。ローンは米ドルペッグの安定コインであるLUSDで発行され、斬新な流動化メカニズムにより、最低担保比率を110%に抑える必要があります。
localize.tagline: 無利子のリクイディティを手に入れることができる

localize.description: Liquity是一种去中心化的借款协议，以ETH作为抵押品提供无息流动资金。贷款以LUSD--一种挂钩美元的稳定币发行，由于采用了新颖的清算机制，需要维持最低抵押率只有110%。
localize.tagline: 免息流动资金随手可得

localize.description: Liquity是一種去中心化的借款協議，以ETH作爲抵押品提供無息流動資金。貸款以LUSD--一種掛鉤美元的穩定幣發行，由於採用了新穎的清算機制，需要維持最低抵押率只有110%。
localize.tagline: 免息流動資金隨手可得

localize.description: Liquityは、ETHを担保に無利息の流動性を提供する分散型の借り入れプロトコルです。ローンは米ドルペッグの安定コインであるLUSDで発行され、斬新な流動化メカニズムにより、最低担保比率を110%に抑える必要があります。
localize.tagline: 無利子のリクイディティを手に入れることができる

nodes.excerpt: Q.Money is not another Bank - we connect all your accounts to become your money's ally. Please note: currently we support Banks in the following Countries: Spain, Portugal, Germany, UK, France.
nodes.title: Q.Money - ¡Not another bank! - Manage all your accounts with just one login.
nodes.author: Andrei Popov

localize.description: Q.Money不是另一家银行--我们将您的所有账户连接起来，成为您的资金盟友。请注意：目前我们支持以下国家的银行。西班牙、葡萄牙、德国、英国、法国。
localize.tagline: 只需一次登录就能管理所有账户。

localize.description: Q.Money不是另一家銀行--我們將您的所有賬戶連接起來，成爲您的資金盟友。請注意：目前我們支持以下國家的銀行。西班牙、葡萄牙、德國、英國、法國。
localize.tagline: 只需一次登錄就能管理所有賬戶。

localize.description: Q.Moneyは他の銀行とは異なり、あなたのすべての口座を結びつけ、あなたのお金の味方になります。ご注意：現在、以下の国の銀行をサポートしています。スペイン、ポルトガル、ドイツ、イギリス、フランス。
localize.tagline: 一度のログインですべてのアカウントを管理できます。

localize.description: Q.Moneyは他の銀行とは異なり、あなたのすべての口座を結びつけ、あなたのお金の味方になります。ご注意：現在、以下の国の銀行をサポートしています。スペイン、ポルトガル、ドイツ、イギリス、フランス。
localize.tagline: 一度のログインですべてのアカウントを管理できます。

nodes.excerpt: Steady Capital is a web dashboard for retail investors to buy shares of income-generating commercial real estate. Make investments and see financial reports in our dashboard, and get monthly deposits from your investments directly to your bank account.
nodes.title: Steady Capital - Passive income-generating commercial real estate for $100
nodes.author: Dillon Zhang Forrest

localize.description: 稳健资本是一个网络仪表盘，供散户购买创收商业地产的股票。在我们的仪表盘上进行投资和查看财务报告，并从您的投资中直接获得每月存款到您的银行账户。
localize.tagline: 100美元的被动创收型商业地产。

localize.description: 穩健資本是一個網絡儀表盤，供散戶購買創收商業地產的股票。在我們的儀表盤上進行投資和查看財務報告，並從您的投資中直接獲得每月存款到您的銀行賬戶。
localize.tagline: 100美元的被動創收型商業地產。

nodes.excerpt: FarmTogether is a technology-powered investment platform that provides direct access to farmland as an asset class.
nodes.title: FarmTogether - Democratizing farmland investing

nodes.excerpt: Create remarkable invoices in 3 simple steps. Let’s start with products or goods.

nodes.excerpt: We're here to help you experience the joy of second home ownership. With Pacaso, you own a second home for 1/8 of the cost, while avoiding the hassles of traditional ownership. We'll help you find the perfect fit. You decide how many shares you'd like to own.
nodes.title: Pacaso - The modern way to buy and own a second home
nodes.author: Sarah Wright

localize.description: 我们在这里帮助您体验二手房所有权的乐趣。有了Pacaso，您只需花费1/8的成本就能拥有一套二手房，同时避免了传统置业的麻烦。我们会帮您找到最合适的房子。您决定您想拥有多少股份。
localize.tagline: 现代人购买和拥有第二套住房的方式。

localize.description: 我們在這裏幫助您體驗二手房所有權的樂趣。有了Pacaso，您只需花費1/8的成本就能擁有一套二手房，同時避免了傳統置業的麻煩。我們會幫您找到最合適的房子。您決定您想擁有多少股份。
localize.tagline: 現代人購買和擁有第二套住房的方式。

nodes.excerpt: Krypto allows you to invest, trade, gift, and pay with cryptocurrency seamlessly to anyone, anywhere, anytime. 🎉 Trade For free 💎 Pay with Crypto to any vendor in India having a UPI address or debit card machine 🚀 Send & Recieve Crypto for free
nodes.title: Krypto - Buy, sell and pay with crypto for free
nodes.author: Shaaran Lakshminarayanan

localize.description: Krypto允许你在任何时间，任何地点，向任何人无缝地投资，交易，馈赠和支付加密货币。🎉 Trade For free 💎 Pay with Crypto to any vendor in India having a UPI address or debit card machine 🚀 Send & Recieve Crypto for free.
localize.tagline: 免费使用加密技术进行购买、出售和支付。

localize.description: Krypto允許你在任何時間，任何地點，向任何人無縫地投資，交易，饋贈和支付加密貨幣。🎉 Trade For free 💎 Pay with Crypto to any vendor in India having a UPI address or debit card machine 🚀 Send & Recieve Crypto for free.
localize.tagline: 免費使用加密技術進行購買、出售和支付。

nodes.excerpt: Create and send professional invoices and estimates with an online solution Invoicy. A few clicks and you can accept payment online using Paypal or Stripe. Most suitable for freelancers and small teams, happy invoicing!
nodes.title: Invoicy 2.0 - Invoicing solution for freelancers and small teams
nodes.author: Denis Molozhavyy

localize.description: 使用在线解决方案Invoicy创建和发送专业发票和估算。只需点击几下，你就可以使用Paypal或Stripe在线接受付款。最适合自由职业者和小团队使用，祝您开票愉快!
localize.tagline: 为自由职业者和小型团队提供的发票解决方案。

localize.description: 使用在線解決方案Invoicy創建和發送專業發票和估算。只需點擊幾下，你就可以使用Paypal或Stripe在線接受付款。最適合自由職業者和小團隊使用，祝您開票愉快!
localize.tagline: 爲自由職業者和小型團隊提供的發票解決方案。

nodes.excerpt: The first reliable all-in-one investing, trading, and saving application. A platform for analyzing and executing on quality information, and then sharing thoughts, research, and profits to any social media platform with a button tap. BETA: http://www.tradearies.com/?kid=1F6DV1
nodes.title: Aries - Bridging the stock market gap between retail and wall-street
nodes.author: Reda

localize.description: 第一款可靠的集投资、交易、储蓄于一体的应用。一个对优质信息进行分析和执行的平台，然后通过点击按钮将想法、研究和利润分享到任何社交媒体平台。BETA：http://www.tradearies.com/?kid=1F6DV1

nodes.excerpt: Stike allows you to use your Debit Card, Credit Card or Bank account to instantly send and receive funds with 0 fees using the Bitcoin Lightning network to transmit payments. Users can also send to regular Bitcoin addresses as well.
nodes.title: Strike - Send money instantly, with no fees, anywhere in the world
nodes.author: Henk Holveck

localize.description: Stike允许您使用您的借记卡、信用卡或银行账户以0费用使用比特币闪电网络即时发送和接收资金，传输支付。用户也可以向普通的比特币地址发送。
localize.tagline: 在世界任何地方即时汇款，不收取任何费用。

localize.description: Stike允許您使用您的借記卡、信用卡或銀行賬戶以0費用使用比特幣閃電網絡即時發送和接收資金，傳輸支付。用戶也可以向普通的比特幣地址發送。
localize.tagline: 在世界任何地方即時匯款，不收取任何費用。

nodes.excerpt: Join the Stock Rewards Revolution! Get fractional shares of the brands you love as you shop, automatically. No need to "tap to activate". Simply link as many bank accounts as you like and sit back and earn Stock Rewards.

localize.description: 加入股票奖励革命! 在您购物时自动获得您喜爱的品牌的零碎股份。无需 "点击激活"。只需连接任意数量的银行账户，便可坐享股票奖励。

nodes.excerpt: Bankiom is kind of Expedia for your money Track all your money Send money like texting Grow your wealth like a pro in a fun way Your mission if you choose to accept it is to catch our bugs & provide your feedback Let’s change the world one account at a time!
nodes.title: Bankiom - Smart online banking app to connect your money to your dream
nodes.author: Aguu

localize.description: Bankiom是一种为你的钱而设的Expedia 追踪你所有的钱 像发短信一样发钱 以一种有趣的方式像专业人员一样增长你的财富 如果你选择接受它，你的任务是抓住我们的错误和提供你的反馈 让我们一次改变一个账户的世界!
localize.tagline: 智能网银应用，让你的钱和梦想连接起来。

localize.description: Bankiom是一種爲你的錢而設的Expedia 追蹤你所有的錢 像發短信一樣發錢 以一種有趣的方式像專業人員一樣增長你的財富 如果你選擇接受它，你的任務是抓住我們的錯誤和提供你的反饋 讓我們一次改變一個賬戶的世界!
localize.tagline: 智能網銀應用，讓你的錢和夢想連接起來。

nodes.excerpt: Alpaca offers the world’s first commission-free fractional trading API to allow us to build more flexible quant trading models and fintech apps.

localize.tagline: 免佣金的API，交易和投资的价格仅为1美元

localize.description: Alpaca提供了全球首個免佣金的零碎交易API，讓我們可以建立更靈活的量化交易模型和金融科技應用。

nodes.excerpt: Ennerate (YC W21) does business valuations for small and medium sized traditional businesses (plumbers, manufacturing, etc.) for 5x faster and 10x cheaper than existing services. Users upload financials, take a survey, and our models generate the valuation.
nodes.title: Ennerate - Automated business valuations for 'Main Street' companies
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Ennerate（YC W21）为中小型传统企业（水电工、制造业等）做商业估值，比现有服务快5倍，便宜10倍。用户上传财务资料，进行调查，我们的模型就会生成估值。
localize.tagline: 为 "大街 "公司进行自动商业评估。

localize.description: Ennerate（YC W21）爲中小型傳統企業（水電工、製造業等）做商業估值，比現有服務快5倍，便宜10倍。用戶上傳財務資料，進行調查，我們的模型就會生成估值。
localize.tagline: 爲 "大街 "公司進行自動商業評估。

nodes.excerpt: Invest in Alternative assets like crypto, collectibles, real estate, and more? No more silly spreadsheets to track your Alt investments. Connect your Alt accounts to track your portfolio's performance. Also, discover over 150 new investments on MoneyMade!

nodes.excerpt: Make smarter trades by getting real-time alerts from Contora that are triggered by data from unusual sources — such as Reddit mentions, recent company jobs postings and firings, viral posts on social media, and much more.
nodes.title: Contora - Better trades with real-time data from unusual sources

nodes.excerpt: Prize Card™ is a debit card that lets you win money and rewards instantly every time you use it. When you pay using Prize Card™ the merchant (i.e. the store) pays us a small transaction fee which we use to fund giveaways.
nodes.title: Prize - Debit card with amazing rewards
nodes.author: Hyacinthe Hamon

nodes.excerpt: With Portal, let your clients login on your own website and give them one place for payments, messaging, file-sharing, eSignatures, intake forms, and more.
nodes.title: Portal - The modern client portal
nodes.author: Kat Manalac

localize.description: 通过Portal，让您的客户在自己的网站上登录，并为他们提供一个地方进行支付、信息传递、文件共享、电子签名、接收表格等。
localize.tagline: 现代客户门户

localize.description: 通過Portal，讓您的客戶在自己的網站上登錄，併爲他們提供一個地方進行支付、信息傳遞、文件共享、電子簽名、接收表格等。
localize.tagline: 現代客戶門戶

nodes.excerpt: Cadoo is the most intense way to reach your fitness goals. ⠀ Browse challenges, commit to a fitness goal, use a fitness tracker to track your progress. Winners get their money back + extra money from the challenge losers.
nodes.title: Cadoo - Your running drill coach that motivates you with money
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 凯度是达到你健身目标的最紧张的方式。⠀ 浏览挑战，承诺一个健身目标，使用健身跟踪器来跟踪你的进展。赢家可以拿回他们的钱+挑战失败者的额外资金。
localize.tagline: 你的跑操教练，用金钱来激励你。

localize.description: 凱度是達到你健身目標的最緊張的方式。⠀ 瀏覽挑戰，承諾一個健身目標，使用健身跟蹤器來跟蹤你的進展。贏家可以拿回他們的錢+挑戰失敗者的額外資金。
localize.tagline: 你的跑操教練，用金錢來激勵你。

nodes.excerpt: Finary is a beautiful portfolio tracker with built-in performance reports 💰 Track all your investments - stocks, crypto, startups.. 🌎 Integrations with 10.000+ banks & investment platforms worldwide 📈 Profit & loss analysis 👉 Give it a try!
nodes.title: Finary - Track your net worth in real-time
nodes.author: Nicolas Dessaigne

localize.description: Finary是一个漂亮的投资组合跟踪器，内置业绩报告 💰 跟踪你所有的投资 - 股票，加密，创业公司... 🌎 与全球10.000+银行和投资平台整合 📈 盈利和亏损分析 👉 给它一个尝试!
localize.tagline: 实时跟踪您的净资产

localize.description: Finary是一個漂亮的投資組合跟蹤器，內置業績報告 💰 跟蹤你所有的投資 - 股票，加密，創業公司... 🌎 與全球10.000+銀行和投資平臺整合 📈 盈利和虧損分析 👉 給它一個嘗試!
localize.tagline: 實時跟蹤您的淨資產

nodes.excerpt: Budgetwell is a personal budgeting tool that is designed to take into account all income, present and future, to help you manage your finances.
nodes.title: Budgetwell - personal budgeting with clarity
nodes.author: Alfred

localize.description: Budgetwell是一款个人预算工具，它的设计是考虑到所有的收入，现在和未来，帮助你管理你的财务。
localize.tagline: 清晰的个人预算

localize.description: Budgetwell是一款個人預算工具，它的設計是考慮到所有的收入，現在和未來，幫助你管理你的財務。
localize.tagline: 清晰的個人預算
